message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the impact it can have on your operations, I am offering it to you for $2000000. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also the exclusive access and support we provide to our valued customers. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in your product, but the price of $2000000 is outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $1500000, which is the maximum I can afford. This price reflects the value I see in the product and is fair considering my needs. I'm confident this is a mutually beneficial agreement.
